item.title: An options trade on Nvidia that gives upside exposure and downside protection as earnings approach
item.description: Options trader Michael Khouw breaks down an options trade on Nvidia ahead of the company's earnings report next week.

item.title: Instacart will struggle as competition heats up, Wedbush says
item.description: Increasing competition in the grocery delivery space could send Maplebear shares lower over the coming months, according to Wedbush Securities.

item.title: Buy this tech services stock as positive catalysts start lining up, says Morgan Stanley
item.description: The firm upgraded the tech services company to overweight from equal weight and increased its price target by $6.

item.title: UBS raises price target on Nvidia ahead of earnings, says tailwinds ‘remain strong’
item.description: UBS is growing more bullish on Nvidia ahead of its second-quarter earnings results after the bell next Wednesday.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Tech shares slumped on Wednesday, dragging the S&P 500 to its fourth straight losing session. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.
